languages.text: "Сожалею, что вынужден был принести вам тревожную весть, Лорд-капитан".
"I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Сожалею, что вынужден был принести вам тревожную весть, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "I apologize for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."
"I apologize for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."
"I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."
"I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."
"I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “我很抱歉给您带来了这个令人不安的消息，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉给您带来了这个令人不安的消息，舰长大人。”

languages.text: « Je m'excuse d'avoir à vous relayer d'aussi préoccupantes nouvelles, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'excuse d'avoir à vous relayer d'aussi préoccupantes nouvelles, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Siento haberle tenido que comunicar tal adverso suceso, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Siento haberle tenido que comunicar tal adverso suceso, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「このような悩ましいお知らせをしなければならないことをお詫びします、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「このような悩ましいお知らせをしなければならないことをお詫びします、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Entschuldigung, dass ich Euch diese beunruhigenden Nachrichten überbringen muss, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Entschuldigung, dass ich Euch diese beunruhigenden Nachrichten überbringen muss, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Bu kötü haberi size bildirmek durumunda kaldığım için üzgünüm Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for having to bring you this troubling news, Lord Captain."
